events.message: We have received the application for the software engineer position from the candidate and the resume looks promising with relevant experience.
The candidate's application has been categorized under the Engineering cluster based on keywords such as software and developer present in their resume.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to handle this candidate's hiring process and will reach out shortly.
The initial screening call was completed successfully, and the candidate demonstrated strong knowledge of software development and relevant tools.
The candidate responded promptly expressing enthusiasm about the next steps and showed availability for the technical interview scheduling.
Technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate on 2024-05-25 to assess coding skills and problem-solving capabilities.
